name: Spectral_Wounds
display_help: Spectral Wounds convinces the target that they have taken severe damage. The illusion is so convincing that the victim can fall from the Spectral Wounds. However, the damage is not real, and if the victim survives long enough, the illusion will fade and some of the wounds will heal. Damage: High(Illusionary), Recharge: Moderate

name: Blind
display_help: Painfully Blinds a single targeted foe so severely that they are rendered helpless. Blind is so bright that additional foes may also be blinded, though they will not take any damage, and attacking them will free them from the effects. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Psionic), Foe Hold/Sleep

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Group_Invisibility
display_help: Makes you and all teammates around you Invisible. While Invisible, you and your teammates are almost impossible to detect. Even if discovered, Group Invisibility grants a bonus to your Defense to all attacks, although you will lose some of your defense bonus if you attack. Group Invisibility has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Sonic_Siphon
display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow

name: Sonic_Dispersion
display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)

name: Thunder_Kick
display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average change to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

name: Shuriken
display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Crippling_Axe_Kick
display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals moderate smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: High_Pain_Tolerance
display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: Fast_Healing
display_help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

name: Quick_Recovery
display_help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

name: Force_Smash
display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.

name: Plasma_Burst
display_help: The DUST primary weapon charges up a powerful burst of plasma. The extreme heat of this attack gives it the potential to set you on fire. The burst of toxic chemicals may also reduce your regeneration.

name: Force_Smash
display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.

name: Plasma_Burst
display_help: The DUST primary weapon charges up a powerful burst of plasma. The extreme heat of this attack gives it the potential to set you on fire. The burst of toxic chemicals may also reduce your regeneration.

name: Toxic_Burst
display_help: The DUST primary weapon can have its ignition system switched off, allowing the soldier to fire the fuel as a projectile. This projectile bursts in a small area around the target, dealing toxic damage to all those in the vicinity. The volatile chemicals evaporate quickly, causing continuous toxic damage, as well as regeneration reduction and possible Endurance drain.

name: Shockwave_Grenade
display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. Their secondary fire mode allows them to lob a highly damaging Shockwave Grenade at their target. This causes bleed damage over time and can knock their target from its feet.

name: Toxic_Burst
display_help: The DUST primary weapon can have its ignition system switched off, allowing the soldier to fire the fuel as a projectile. This projectile bursts in a small area around the target, dealing toxic damage to all those in the vicinity. The volatile chemicals evaporate quickly, causing continuous toxic damage, as well as regeneration reduction and possible Endurance drain.

name: Shockwave_Grenade
display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. Their secondary fire mode allows them to lob a highly damaging Shockwave Grenade at their target. This causes bleed damage over time and can knock their target from its feet.

name: Force_Punch
display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.

name: Plasma_Stream
display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. The default firing mode allows the DUST Ranger to use their weapon as a high efficiency flamethrower, launching exceptionally charged plasma streams at a target. This causes damage over time and reduces regeneration rates of affected targets.

name: Force_Punch
display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.

name: Plasma_Stream
display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. The default firing mode allows the DUST Ranger to use their weapon as a high efficiency flamethrower, launching exceptionally charged plasma streams at a target. This causes damage over time and reduces regeneration rates of affected targets.

name: Damage_MN
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Sonic_Blast
display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Tactical_Appraisal
display_help: The Monitor Sphere is capable of quickly analyzing nearby targets and locating weaknesses. This data is then quickly passed off to Praetorian Police Officers in the nearby area increasing their chance to hit.

name: Call_Reinforcements
display_help: Monitor Spheres are capable of summoning reinforcements from the TEST department who are ready to be dispatched at a moment's notice.

name: Resistance
display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

name: Force_Maul
display_help: You have been knocked down

name: Force_Netting
display_help: A PPD Enforcer is capable of entangling their targets in a "mostly harmless" force netting that causes minor damage over time as well as slowing the target.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Bolts
display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Blast
display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Cage
display_help: PPD Investigators are capable of binding their target within a fragile Force Cage, it is capable of putting its target to sleep for a short time. However any damage dealt to the target will break the effect.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Bolts
display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Blast
display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Impact_Bomb
display_help: The Investigator charges up their force gauntlet to unleash a devastating Impact Bomb which deals moderate energy and smashing damage to all enemies within 15 feet of its initial target. Targets struck by this power may be knocked down or stunned.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Damage Moderate (Smash/Energy) Foe Knockdown, Disorient

display_help: You have been knocked down

display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Shockwave
display_help: This quick blast of force gauntlet energy deals very little damage, but has a very high change to stun its targets.

name: Resistance
display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

name: Resistance
display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

name: Force_Wave
display_help: The PPD Sergeant is capable of firing a charged up blast of force energy in a short cone in front of him causing minor energy and smashing damage as well as knocking down its targets.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Blast
display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Burst
display_help: The PPD Suppressor is capable of firing a charged up blast of force energy in a short cone in front of him causing minor energy and smashing damage as well as knocking down its targets.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Bolts
display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Bolts
display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Reduced_Health
display_help: Resistance

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

name: Force_Blast
display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Force_Cage
display_help: Warrant Officers are capable of binding their target within a fragile Force Cage, it is capable of putting its target to sleep for a short time. However any damage dealt to the target will break the effect.

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: Tesla Cage confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Voltaic_Sentinel
display_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. The Sentinel can fly and will follow you. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -End

name: Transfusion
display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow

name: Siphon_Speed
display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long

name: Speed_Boost
display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Transfusion
display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow

name: Siphon_Speed
display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long

name: Barb_Swipe
display_help: Shred your opponent with several quick Swipes from your Spines. Barb Swipe deals minor damage over time. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast

name: Lunge
display_help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Spine_Burst
display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Charged_Armor
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Conductive_Shield
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a Conductive Shield that will conduct many sorts of energy away from your body. Conductive Shield grants high resistant to Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as good resistance to Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Fast

name: Electric_Fence
display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Scorch
display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Cremate
display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Deflection
display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast

name: True_Grit
display_help: Your intense training has left you tougher than even the hardiest of heroes. You gain additional hit points and resistance to fire, cold, energy, negative energy and toxic damage sources. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
display_short_help: Auto: Self +Res (Cold, Energy, Fire, Negative Energy, Toxic), +MaxHealth

name: Against_all_Odds
display_help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Slow

name: Force_Smasher
display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.

name: Force_Vortex
display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.

name: Resistance
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Plasma_Burst
display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockdown, -Regen

name: Resistance
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Call_Reinforcements
display_help: Lieutenants are capable of calling for backup from the TEST department who send a Monitor Sphere to determine if additional aid is needed.

name: Force_Brawl
display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from the Force Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.

name: Plasma_Blast
display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.

name: Resistance
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

name: Personal_Force_Field
display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow

name: Force_Bolt
display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Jab
display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Punch
display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off their feet, unable to attack again until they stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Focused_Fighting
display_help: You become more evasive to melee attacks while you have Focused Fighting activated. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and DeBuffs to Defense. Recharge: Fast

name: Focused_Senses
display_help: You become more evasive against ranged attacks while you have Focused Senses activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged attacks as long as it is active. Your Improved Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes as well as resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

name: Evasion
display_help: You are Evasive against area effect and cone shaped attacks. This power increases your Defense versus such attacks as long as it is active. Evasion also helps you resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

name: Kinetic_Shield
display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)

name: Dampening_Field
display_help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: Power_Shield
display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)

name: Energy_Protection
display_help: Your ability to channel energy makes you naturally resistant to Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: Quick_Strike
display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

name: Body_Blow
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Repulsing_Torrent
display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
